headline.print_headline: An Advocacy Ad Stirs a National Debate
headline.seo: An Advocacy Ad Stirs a National Debate
headline.main: An Advocacy Ad Stirs a National Debate

docs.lead_paragraph: The evangelical group, Focus on the Family, has purchased an ad for the Super Bowl that is expected to contain an anti-abortion message.
docs.snippet: The evangelical group, Focus on the Family, has purchased an ad for the Super Bowl that is expected to contain an anti-abortion message.
